solution_line_template: Cindy puts in {dime_value} cents x {cindy_dimes} = <<{dime_value}*{cindy_dimes}={cindy_cents}>>{cindy_cents} cents.
Eric puts in {eric_quarters} x {quarter_value} cents = <<{eric_quarters}*{quarter_value}={eric_cents}>>{eric_cents} cents.
Garrick puts in {garrick_nickels} x {nickel_value} cents = <<{garrick_nickels}*{nickel_value}={garrick_cents}>>{garrick_cents} cents.
Ivy puts in {ivy_pennies} x {penny_value} cent = <<{ivy_pennies}*{penny_value}={ivy_cents}>>{ivy_cents} cents.

Together, they put into the pond, this amount of money, {cindy_cents} + {eric_cents} + {garrick_cents} + {ivy_cents} = <<{cindy_cents}+{eric_cents}+{garrick_cents}+{ivy_cents}={total_cents}>>{total_cents} cents
